ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: R script used to analyse flight initiation distance data
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: This is a plain text file contain the R script that we used to analyse the lizard FID data. It is self-explanatory, so no separate ReadMe file is provided.
